forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog after 3am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. North northeast wind 6 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city greets a mix of clarity and softness, bathed in the gentle sunlight that heralds a day filled with promise. The temperature hovers in the cool realm of fifty-nine degrees, offering a crispness that invites variety in attire. A light north northeast wind whispers through the streets, carrying with it a hint of the ocean's breath—an echo of the fog that will creep in later tonight, wrapping the city in its familiar embrace. 

The morning sky, a clear blue canvas, is gradually revealing its character, while the fog remains mostly at bay, only teasing the edges of the city. As the sun reaches its zenith, expect the temperature to dip slightly into the mid-fifties, signaling a perfect moment for light layers—a sweater or a light jacket paired with comfortably worn jeans would be ideal. Today is suited for quiet walks along Embarcadero, perhaps stopping for a warmed coffee at a local café, where you can savor the tranquil ambiance. Alternatively, a visit to one of the nearby parks, enveloped by the allure of morning light, offers a chance to breathe deeply, as the city awakens and stirs all around you.
